alert.note: Alert for Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 1:22PM EDT until June 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in Big Bend of Florida... Dixie County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 122 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles south of Madison to 16 miles southwest of Mayo to near Steinhatchee to 17 miles west of Horseshoe Point, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Steinhatchee, Cooks Hammock, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Chancey, Buckville, Guaranto Springs, Jena, Alton, Mayo Junction, Townsend, Hines, Jonesboro, Grady, Hatch Bend, Eugene and Fletcher. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
